price: He said, “Do you give me glad tidings despite my old age? What glad tidings are you giving me?”
arabic: قَالَ أَبَشَّرۡتُمُونِي عَلَىٰٓ أَن مَّسَّنِيَ ٱلۡكِبَرُ فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
